instructions:
Heat oven to 350 F. Remove skin from chicken thighs; wash and dry thoroughly. Dip chicken in
evaporated milk then roll in mixture of crumbs, salt and pepper. Place chicken pieces on a rack on a rimmed
baking sheet and drizzle with melted butter. Bake for 45 minutes or until done. Serve with barbecue sauce
for dipping. 
*(Rev. 11/17/97)*
ingredients: 1/2 cup evaporated milk (or sour cream and a little
name: Corn Crisped Chicken
